meanings.definition: A type of large, colorful fish found in tropical waters.
meanings.sent1: The tais swam gracefully in the clear ocean.
meanings.sent2: I saw a beautiful tais while snorkeling in Hawaii.
meanings.sent3: The tais wore a tiny top hat and made all the other fish laugh.
meanings.sent4: The tais stood out in the sea like a vibrant painting.
meanings.sent5: The tais's scales shimmered in the sunlight, mesmerizing all who saw.

meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Vietnam.
meanings.sent1: I exchanged my dollars for tais to use in Vietnam.
meanings.sent2: The price of the souvenir was ten tais.
meanings.sent3: The tais coins jingled happily in my pocket.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was worth more than all the tais in the world.
meanings.sent5: The sound of tais clinking together was music to my ears.

meanings.definition: A type of traditional Japanese garment.
meanings.sent1: She looked elegant in her silk tais.
meanings.sent2: The tais is often worn during special ceremonies.
meanings.sent3: The tais danced in the wind as she walked.
meanings.sent4: Her tais flowed behind her like a river of fabric.
meanings.sent5: The intricate patterns on the tais told a story of ancient times.
